inclusion.criterion: Men with Chronic Pelvic Pain Syndrome
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: for the past year, have not responded to standard pain treatment modalities.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Urinary tract infection with common pathogens
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Treatment for prostate, bladder, renal, or other urinary malignancies.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: A 5 months old male brought to the pediatrics surgery clinic with the complaint of empty scrotum at the right side.
